io.github.struppigel.parser

Class PESignature

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.struppigel.parser.PESignature

  • public class PESignature
extends java.lang.Object
    Reads the offset of the PE signature and the signature itself.

    Can be used to verify that the file is indeed a PE file.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int PE_OFFSET_LOCATION
      The file offset that contains the PE Signature offset is 60 .
      static int PE_OFFSET_LOCATION_SIZE
      The number of bytes that define the PE Signature offset
      static byte[] PE_SIG
      The signature bytes of the string PE\0\0.

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a PESignature instance with the input file.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public void read()
          throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the PE signature and sets the peOffset.
        Throws:
        FileFormatException - if file is not a PE file
        java.io.IOException - if something went wrong while trying to read the file

      • repair

        public void repair(java.io.File outFile)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • exists

        public boolean exists()
        Tries to read the PE signature of the current file and returns true, iff it was successfull.
        Returns:
        true if the file has the PE signature, false otherwise.

      • getOffset

        public long getOffset()
        Returns the offset of the PE signature.
        Returns:
        optional offset of PE signature
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if file hasn't been read yet or the read file was no PE file.

      • getInfo

        public java.lang.String getInfo()
        Returns a description string.
        Returns:
        description string of the pe signature
